cause.description:
Established in Late 2005, the Save the Treehouse Foundation of America has been raising awareness about arborial housing for well over 16 months now. Overall, STFA exists to encourage people to live in trees and to preserve America's proud tradition of tree houses and homes.
1. Treehouses are a universal right.
2. Brazil's rapid deforestation practices must be abolished to protect Amazonian Treehouses.
3. Treehouses should be tax exempt.
4. Colin Peters is a B.A.M.F.
cause.mission: Preserve Arborial Abodes of all Types
cause.name: Save the Treehouse Foundation of America
